body_content.explanation: a piece of equipment consisting of a chair attached to a ski, or the winter sport that involves sliding down a mountain on this equipment :
examples: The Ski Fox is probably one of the most exciting pieces of sports gear you will be able to rent from us.
You can try Skifox and the fun sports listed below for free if you're staying at the hotel.
Skiing, snowboarding, skifox, skidoo. I've tried them all.
